text: River of Romance is a 1929 American drama movie directed by Richard Wallace and was based on the play Magnolia by Booth Tarkington. It stars Charles Buddy Rogers, Mary Brian, June Collyer, Henry B. Walthall, Wallace Berry, Fred Kohler, Natalie Kingston, Walter McGrail and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1929 drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Richard Wallace Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: River of Romance
